Entry.JapaneseText: おまっとさん！ <Tytree>お兄さんの昔話、始まり始まりー
Entry.EnglishText: Sorry for keeping you waiting! It's time for big bro Tytree's tales of old to begin!

Entry.JapaneseText: 昔々、あるところに、おじいさんと おばあさんが住んでいました。
Entry.EnglishText: A long time ago, far far away, there lived an old man and an old woman.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一見、幸せそうなふたりでしたが、なんと、 おじいさんは恐ろしい怪物だったのです！
Entry.EnglishText: At first glance, it appeared as though they were a happy couple, BUT! The old man was a terrifying monster!

Entry.JapaneseText: そして、その怪物の正体は……
Entry.EnglishText: And the true form of that monster was...

Entry.JapaneseText: あーッ!! <Annie>が目を開けたまま気絶してる！
Entry.EnglishText: Ahhh! <Annie>'s passed out with her eyes wide open!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでだよ？ まだ何も話してないぜ……
Entry.EnglishText: But why? I've barely even said anything yet...

Entry.JapaneseText: 忘れてた。 <Annie>はすっごく恐がりだったんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: I forgot. <Annie> is a huge scaredy-cat.
